text: Total hundial collection of Sri Dhandayuthapaniswamy temple over the last 13 days was Rs.2,15,72,789 in cash, according to HR&CE Joint Commissioner P. Rajamanickam here on Tuesday. Besides, 385 grams of gold, 10,900 grams of silver and 365 number of foreign currency notes in various denominations were the other collections in the hundial. More than 350 volunteers including students, temple staff and bank staff took part in the counting process, he said.
title: Hundial collection
